casebody.data:
Lannie Dale MILLS and Karen Lynn Mills Myers, as Co-executors of the Estates of Thomas C. Mills, deceased, and Dorothy Y. Mills, deceased, Plaintiffs,
v.
Jethro Barnes MAJETTE, III, Stanislawa J. Majette, and Margo Prescott Majette, Defendants. No. COA16-1145 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: May 16, 2017

AFFIRMED IN PART; REVERSED IN PART; AND REMANDED.
